15 class RangeValidator extends ValidatorHasNotNull {
16  protected $min;
17  protected $max;
18 
19  public function __construct() {
20  $this->message = "This value should be between `{min}` and `{max}`";
21  }
22 
23  public function validate($value) {
24  parent::validate ( $value );
25  if ($this->notNull !== false) {
26  return $value >= $this->min && $value <= $this->max;
27  }
28  return true;
29  }
30 
36  public function getParameters(): array {
37  return [ "min","max","value" ];
38  }
39 }
